titles.title: A joint resolution to designate October 19, 1994, as "Mercy Otis Warren Day", and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13523)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Senate Committee on Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 9/27/1994--Introduced. Designates October 19, 1994, as Mercy Otis Warren Day.
